title: Review of Extreme Multilabel Classification. (arXiv:2302.05971v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: Extreme multilabel classification or XML, is an active area of interest in machine learning. Compared to traditional multilabel classification, here the number of labels is extremely large, hence, the name extreme multilabel classification. Using classical one versus all classification wont scale in this case due to large number of labels, same is true for any other classifiers. Embedding of labels as well as features into smaller label space is an essential first step. Moreover, other issues include existence of head and tail labels, where tail labels are labels which exist in relatively smaller number of given samples. The existence of tail labels creates issues during embedding. This area has invited application of wide range of approaches ranging from bit compression motivated from compressed sensing, tree based embeddings, deep learning based latent space embedding including using attention weights, linear algebra based embeddings such as SVD, clustering, hashing, to name a few. translated_abstract: 极端多标签分类或XML是机器学习中一个活跃的研究领域。与传统的多标签分类相比，这里的标签数量极大，因此称为极端多标签分类。使用传统的一对多分类方法在这种情况下无法扩展，因为标签的数量太大，其他分类器也是如此。将标签和特征嵌入较小的标签空间是必要的第一步。此外，其他问题包括存在头部和尾部标签，其中尾部标签是相对较少的标签。尾部标签的存在会在嵌入时创建问题。这个领域涉及到了各种方法的应用，包括基于压缩感知的比特压缩、基于树的嵌入、基于深度学习的潜在空间嵌入（包括使用注意权重）、基于线性代数的嵌入（如奇异值分解）、聚类、哈希等等。
tldr: 极端多标签分类是机器学习中的一个研究方向，由于标签数量极大，需要将标签和特征嵌入较小的标签空间，同时还要解决头部和尾部标签问题。应用的方法包括压缩、树、深度学习、线性代数、聚类和哈希。
en_tdlr: Extreme multilabel classification is a research area in machine learning. Due to the large number of labels, embedding them along with features into a smaller label space is necessary, as well as addressing head and tail label issues. Approaches include compression, tree-based and deep-learning-based embeddings, linear algebra, clustering, and hashing.
